casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Judy HARDISON. No. 387P15-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Jan. 28, 2016. John F. Carella, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Hardison, Judy. Torrey Dixon, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. Robert C. Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. Scott E. Thomas, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 23rd of November 2015 by State of NC for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Dissolved by order of the Court in conference, this the 28th of January 2016."
